signature.title: Signature
signature.description: Define how the JSON Web Token must be signed.

kid.title: Key ID
kid.description: Specifies the key ID (kid) to include in the JWT header

id.description: JWT ID (jti) claim is a unique identifier for the JWT. Defaults to UUID.

audiences.title: Audiences
audiences.description: Claim identifies the recipients that the JWT is intended for

issuer.title: Issuer
issuer.description: Claim that identifies the issuer of the JWT

expiresInUnit.title: Expires in unit
expiresInUnit.description: Lifespan of the JWT in seconds, minutes, hours, or days.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: Claim identifies or makes a statement about the subject of the JWT

content.description: Specifies a PEM-encoded private key used to sign the JWT or the secret key used to sign tokens with an HMAC algorithm

customClaims.title: Custom claims
customClaims.description: Specify additional claim name/value pair(s) in the payload of the JWT
